changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLMREGEX SET VALUE='^[\_$\s\w-:.,/\\]{1,4000}$' WHERE REGEXKEY='Parser.writeFilePath';

changeSet.author: sterlite
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for DistributionDriverPathList.dbReadFileNameExtraSuffix
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Discard Read FileName Suffix', 'Discard Read FileName Suffix','DistributionDriverPathList.dbReadFileNameExtraSuffix','^[^<>:""/\|?*]{0,100}$');

changeSet.author: sterlite
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for DistributionDriverPathList.dbReadFileNameExtraSuffix
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) from TBLMREGEX as num), 1, now(), 1, now(),'ACTIVE', 'Discard Read FileName Suffix', 'Discard Read FileName Suffix','DistributionDriverPathList.dbReadFileNameExtraSuffix','^[^<>:""/\|?*]{0,100}$');

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select max(id+1) from TBLMREGEX as id), 1,now(), 1, now(),'ACTIVE', 'Collection Driver Path Valid File Time Interval', 'CollectionDriverPathList','CollectionDriverPathList.validFileTimeInterval','0*([1-9]|[12][0-9]|30)');

changeSet.author: sterlite
changeSet.comment: created view, update report field for EDR MEDSUP 2234 for record level statistic report - changed from 36-66-67-68-69-70 for enddate change
changeSet.createView: SELECT FSTAT.FILEID "RECORDROWID",FSTAT.NETWORKELEMENT "NETWORK_ELEMENT",FSTAT.ORIGINALFILENAME "INPUT_FILE_NAME",FSTAT.FILENAME "COLLECTED_FILE_NAME",DISSTAT.DESTFILENAME "DISTRIBUTED_FILE_NAME",to_char( FSTAT.CREATEDDATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "START_DATE", to_char(FSTAT.LASTUPDATEDDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "END_DATE", (FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS + FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "COLLECTED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS "PARSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS "PARSE_FAILURE", FSTAT.PROSUCCESSRECORDS "PROCESSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PROFILTERRECORDS "FILTERED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PROINVALIDRECORDS "INVALID_RECORDS",'0' "ROUTING_RECORDS", FSTAT.PROERRORRECORDS "PROCESSING_FAILURE",FSTAT.PRODUPLICATERECORDS "DUPLICATE_RECORDS",FSTAT.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.AGGERRORRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_FAILURE",FSTAT.CONSUCCESSRECORDS "CONSOLIDATED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.CONERRORRECORDS "CONSOLIDATION_FAILURE",FSTAT.DISSUCCESSRECORDS "DISTRIBUTED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.DISERRORRECORDS "DISTRIBUTION_FAILURE", FSTAT.STATUS "STATUS" FROM TBLTFILESTATISTICS FSTAT LEFT JOIN TBLTDISFILESTATISTICSDETAIL DISSTAT ON FSTAT.FILEID = DISSTAT.FILEID
changeSet.sql: update TBLMDYNAMICREPORT set displayfields='NETWORK_ELEMENT;INPUT_FILE_NAME;COLLECTED_FILE_NAME;DISTRIBUTED_FILE_NAME;START_DATE;END_DATE;COLLECTED_RECORDS;PARSED_SUCCESSFULLY;PARSE_FAILURE;PROCESSED_SUCCESSFULLY;FILTERED_RECORDS;INVALID_RECORDS;ROUTING_RECORDS;PROCESSING_FAILURE;DUPLICATE_RECORDS;AGGREGATION_READ_SUCCESSFULLY;AGGREGATION_READ_FAILURE;CONSOLIDATED_SUCCESSFULLY;CONSOLIDATION_FAILURE;DISTRIBUTED_SUCCESSFULLY;DISTRIBUTION_FAILURE;STATUS' where viewname='VWRECORDSTATEDR'

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: create view for daily file statistics
changeSet.createView: select row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY true) as "recordrowid", NETWORKELEMENT as "networkelement", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "day", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') as "month", sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as "processfiles" , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "failfiles", count(fileid) as "totalfiles", sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) "parssingsuccesspacket", sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) "parsingerrorpacket", sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccessrecord", sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) "parsingerrorecord", sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccess", sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) "processinginvalid", sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) "processingduplicate", sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) "processingerror", sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) "processingfilter", sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) "processingclone", sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) "aggregationsuccess", sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) "aggregationerror", sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) "aggregationfilter", sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) "aggregationinvalid", sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) "consolidationsuccess", sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) "consolidationerror", sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) "distributionsuccess", sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) "distributionerror" from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') ,NETWORKELEMENT, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by NETWORKELEMENT,DAY desc

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: create view for hourly file statistics
changeSet.createView: select row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY true) as "recordrowid", NETWORKELEMENT as "networkelement", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH') as "hour", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "day", sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as "processfiles" , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "failfiles", count(fileid) as "totalfiles", sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) "parssingsuccesspacket", sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) "parsingerrorpacket", sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccessrecord", sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) "parsingerrorecord", sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccess", sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) "processinginvalid", sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) "processingduplicate", sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) "processingerror", sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) "processingfilter", sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) "processingclone", sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) "aggregationsuccess", sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) "aggregationerror", sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) "aggregationfilter", sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) "aggregationinvalid", sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) "consolidationsuccess", sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) "consolidationerror", sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) "distributionsuccess", sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) "distributionerror" from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH') ,networkelement, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by networkelement,hour desc

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: create view for monthly file statistics
changeSet.createView: select row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY true) as "recordrowid", NETWORKELEMENT as "networkelement", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') as "month", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY') as "year", sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as "processfiles" , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "failfiles", count(fileid) as "totalfiles", sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) "parssingsuccesspacket", sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) "parsingerrorpacket", sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccessrecord", sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) "parsingerrorecord", sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccess", sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) "processinginvalid", sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) "processingduplicate", sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) "processingerror", sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) "processingfilter", sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) "processingclone", sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) "aggregationsuccess", sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) "aggregationerror", sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) "aggregationfilter", sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) "aggregationinvalid", sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) "consolidationsuccess", sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) "consolidationerror", sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) "distributionsuccess", sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) "distributionerror" from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY') ,networkelement, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') order by networkelement,month desc

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: create view for yearly file statistics
changeSet.createView: select row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY true) as "recordrowid", NETWORKELEMENT as "networkelement", to_char(filedate, 'YYYY') as "year", sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as "processfiles" , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "failfiles", count(fileid) as "totalfiles", sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) "parssingsuccesspacket", sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) "parsingerrorpacket", sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccessrecord", sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) "parsingerrorecord", sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) "parsingsuccess", sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) "processinginvalid", sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) "processingduplicate", sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) "processingerror", sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) "processingfilter", sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) "processingclone", sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) "aggregationsuccess", sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) "aggregationerror", sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) "aggregationfilter", sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) "aggregationinvalid", sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) "consolidationsuccess", sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) "consolidationerror", sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) "distributionsuccess", sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) "distributionerror" from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY'),NETWORKELEMENT order by NETWORKELEMENT,Year desc

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: create view for missing sequences chaged id from 43 to 66 , so that we can creat and replace same view with timstamp select query instead of only date (MEDSUP-2201)
changeSet.createView: SELECT MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID "RECORDROWID", MFDTL.MISSINGSEQUENCE "MISSING_SEQUENCE", FSMGMT.PARENTDEVICE "PARENT_DEVICE", FSMGMT.REFERENCEDEVICE "REFERENCE_DEVICE", to_char( MFDTL.ENTRYDATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "MISSING_ENTRY_DATE", FSMGMT.MINVALUE "MIN_RANGE", FSMGMT.MAXVAL "MAX_RANGE", FSMGMT.NEXTVALUE "EXPECTED_NEXT_VALUE", FSMGMT.RESETFREQUENCY "RESET_FREQUENCY", MFDTL.STATUSMESSAGE "STATUS" FROM TBLTFILESEQMGMT FSMGMT INNER JOIN TBLTMISSINGFILEDETAIL MFDTL ON MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID = FSMGMT.ID WHERE FSMGMT.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID, to_char( MFDTL.ENTRYDATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), FSMGMT.REFERENCEDEVICE, FSMGMT.PARENTDEVICE, FSMGMT.MINVALUE,FSMGMT.MAXVAL, FSMGMT.NEXTVALUE, FSMGMT.RESETFREQUENCY, MFDTL.MISSINGSEQUENCE, MFDTL.STATUSMESSAGE

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: created view, update report field for EDR MEDSUP 2234 for record level statistic report - chaged from 44-45-43 for startdate( creeatedate) JIRA 2228
changeSet.createView: SELECT FSTAT.FILEID "RECORDROWID",FSTAT.NETWORKELEMENT "NETWORK_ELEMENT",FSTAT.ORIGINALFILENAME "INPUT_FILE_NAME",FSTAT.FILENAME "COLLECTED_FILE_NAME",DISSTAT.DESTFILENAME "DISTRIBUTED_FILE_NAME",to_char( FSTAT.CREATEDDATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "START_DATE", to_char(FSTAT.LASTUPDATEDDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "END_DATE", (FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS + FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "COLLECTED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS "PARSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS "PARSE_FAILURE", FSTAT.PROSUCCESSRECORDS "PROCESSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PROFILTERRECORDS "FILTERED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PROINVALIDRECORDS "INVALID_RECORDS",'0' "ROUTING_RECORDS", FSTAT.PROERRORRECORDS "PROCESSING_FAILURE",FSTAT.PRODUPLICATERECORDS "DUPLICATE_RECORDS",FSTAT.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.AGGERRORRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_FAILURE",FSTAT.CONSUCCESSRECORDS "CONSOLIDATED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.CONERRORRECORDS "CONSOLIDATION_FAILURE",FSTAT.DISSUCCESSRECORDS "DISTRIBUTED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.DISERRORRECORDS "DISTRIBUTION_FAILURE", FSTAT.STATUS "STATUS" FROM TBLTFILESTATISTICS FSTAT LEFT JOIN TBLTDISFILESTATISTICSDETAIL DISSTAT ON FSTAT.FILEID = DISSTAT.FILEID
changeSet.sql: update TBLMDYNAMICREPORT set displayfields='NETWORK_ELEMENT;INPUT_FILE_NAME;COLLECTED_FILE_NAME;DISTRIBUTED_FILE_NAME;START_DATE;END_DATE;COLLECTED_RECORDS;PARSED_SUCCESSFULLY;PARSE_FAILURE;PROCESSED_SUCCESSFULLY;FILTERED_RECORDS;INVALID_RECORDS;ROUTING_RECORDS;PROCESSING_FAILURE;DUPLICATE_RECORDS;AGGREGATION_READ_SUCCESSFULLY;AGGREGATION_READ_FAILURE;CONSOLIDATED_SUCCESSFULLY;CONSOLIDATION_FAILURE;DISTRIBUTED_SUCCESSFULLY;DISTRIBUTION_FAILURE;STATUS' where viewname='VWRECORDSTATEDR'
